description: This seafood paella packs a bit of heat and is the perfect dish for a sunny evening.
name: Spicy Seafood Paella Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Remove from the heat, add lemon zest and juice and chopped parsley. Leave to stand for 1 minute and serve with cracked black pepper and lemon wedges.
